desc: The MANI brand is passionately organic and ethically motivated. Pioneers of organic olive production in Greece and renowned for our award winning organic extra virgin olive oil, olives and meze. MANI delivers products which are authentic, raw, vegan and full of flavour.

layout.text: An appreciation for people and nature has inspired the family business since 1979. Pioneers of organic olive production in Greece and renowned for their award winning extra virgin organic olive oil, olives and meze.
